flawed_nl_solution:
It will take 84 / 2 = <<84/2=42>>42 trips to fill the pool with water.
This will take Jimmy 42 trips * 20 seconds per trip = <<42*20=840>>840 seconds.
This means that Jimmy will spend 840 seconds * 1/60 = 41 minutes filling the pool.
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
